deck:
Larry Hagman, who played the villainous oil baron J.R. Ewing for more than a
dozen years on the primetime soap Dallas, died today at the age of 81 in the
city that his show took its name from. He succumbed to complications
surrounding his battle with throat cancer, according to ... More »
headline: Larry Hagman, Dallas's J.R. Ewing, Dies at 81 (New York Magazine)
